attributes.action: overule the dept of Culture, Media & Sports' decision to ban the Red Arrows from the Olympics!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our RAF display team, The Red Arrows, represent the United Kingdom worldwide to show the skill and outstanding ability of the Royal Airforce. Being banned from the displaying at the Olympics for the possibility of offending other nations is totally disgraceful. We should be promoting the combined efforts of our armed forces not shunning them!Please show your support for both the Red Arrows and the people of Great Britain!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
